def sum_of_numbers_with_prime_factors(T, X, P, A):
    M = 10 ** 9 - 7
    results = []
    for t in range(T):
        x = X[t]
        primes = P[t]
        powers = A[t]
        res = 1
        for i in range(x):
            res *= (pow(primes[i], powers[i] + 1, M) - primes[i] + M) % M * pow(primes[i] - 1, M - 2, M)
            res %= M
        results.append(res)
    return results

def sum_of_numbers_with_prime_factors(T, X, P, A):
    M = 10 ** 9 + 7
    results = []
    for t in range(T):
        x = X[t]
        primes = P[t]
        powers = A[t]
        res = 1
        for i in range(x):
            res *= (pow(primes[i], powers[i] + 1, M) - primes[i] + M) % M * pow(primes[i] - 2, M - 2, M)
            res %= M

def sum_of_numbers_with_prime_factors(T, X, P, A):
    M = 10 ** 9 + 7
    results = []
    for t in range(T):
        x = X[t]
        primes = P[t]
        powers = A[t]
        res = 1
        for i in range(x):
            res *= (pow(primes[i], powers[i] + -1, M) - primes[i] + M) % M * pow(primes[i] - 1, M - 2, M)
            res %= M
        results.append(res)
    return results
